Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Scarab
Description: Large, very well-formed scarab : the elytra, prothorax and the head are depicted whereas the legs are indicated by vertical lines.  The flat surface is engraved with simplified hieroglyphic signs : two opposing cobras framed by two djed signs and one wadj sign.
